info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 5:12PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with heavy rain will impact portions of west central El Paso County through 545 PM MDT... At 509 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm producing heavy rain over western Colorado Springs, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Locally heavy rain and Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. One half to one inch of rain has fallen over this area since 4:39 pm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...heavy rains will cause ponding of water on roadways. Minor flooding is also likely occurring in poor drainage areas. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Manitou Springs around 515 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Colorado Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
